QuestData.Title: Stop the Siege
QuestData.Description: It is only a matter of time before this castle is besieged by the forces of the Horde. Destroy three of their siege devices and return to me.
QuestData.LogDescription: Senior Demolitionist Legoso in Wintergrasp Fortress wants you to destroy 3 Horde siege machines.
QuestData.CompletionText: There is no time to waste, have you destroyed their siege vehicles?
QuestData.RewardText: Excellent. That should slow down their assault.
